title: nfl.com active game links do not show live game video feed
content:
I can't get nfl.com active game links to work on firefox. The website looks like it is going to start, but then all the elements fail to load and the main thing I want to see (the live stream) doesn't show up.

I've attached a link to the issue comparing chrome to firefox behavior.

Firefox info is: 95.0.1 (64-bit) Mozilla Firefox for Ubuntu canonical - 1.0
